attributes.action: Legislate to ban drag queens from performing in front of underage children
attributes.additional_details: Drag queens should only perform in front of children over the age of 16, in front of a responsible adult, the show needs to be video recorded, written parental consent must be obtained and the drag queen must pass a criminal records check.
attributes.background: There has been considerable social media coverage about drag queens performing in front of underage children. I believe this should be outlawed.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about children watching drag performances are a matter for individual parents and guardians, not the UK Government or Parliament.
